markdownRemark.html: Our body’s reward system is fueled by the chemical bond dopamine. Whatever you desire in life is accomplished by running tons of this neurotransmitter in our bloodstream, causing our brain to make well grounded decisions and coordinates our body to accomplish each step needed.
